item.title: Useful resources for single cell RNA-seq analysis:
item.description:
Introduction

I have been working on single nuclei RNA-seq and single nuclei ATAC-seq data for about the last year and a half. This is a compilation of resources I have found very helpful throughout this time. I use the (Seurat)[https://satijalab.org/seurat/index.html] single cell toolkit for my analyses so this list is slighlty biased toward resources that use either Seurat or complementary tools.

Tutorials

Cellranger \

These tutorials cover how to use Cellranger. The Cellranger pipeline is used to process the raw 10x Genomics Chromium single-cell RNA-seq output into a gene expression matrix.

Seurat guided clustering tutorial
For downstream analysis, the best place to start is the vignettes published by the (Satija Lab)[https://satijalab.org/], the authors of Seurat. These tutorials provide an overview of the methods and can be used as an initial analysis framework that can be modified to analyse new datasets. \

HBC Single cell RNA-seq data analysis workshop
This workshop made by the Harvard Chan Bioinformatics Core has freely available workshop materials. These workshops provide an in-depth overview of single cell analysis.

item.title: snRNA-seq atlas of pheochromocytoma and paraganglioma
item.description: Pheochromocytomas and paragangliomas (PCPG) are rare neuroendocrine tumors with high heritability and genetic diversity. This study comprised a comprehensive single nuclei RNA-seq analysis of 30 PCPG and two adult adrenal medulla tissues. Additionally, a large compendium of bulk gene expression data (Microarray and RNA-seq) was integrated to enable discovery and characterisation of novel subtypes and validation of the single nuclei data.
